thread.title: BRIEF-India's Axis Bank Says RBI Rejected Bank's Request For Renewal Of Authorization For Gold Import

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-India's Axis Bank Says RBI Rejected Bank's Request For Renewal Of Authorization For Gold Import

organizations.name: axis bank says rbi rejected bank's request for renewal of authorization for gold import april

text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Axis Bank Ltd:
* CLARIFIES ON NEWS ITEM ON RBI DROPPING AXIS BANK FROM LIST OF BULLION IMPORTERS
* RBI INFORMED CO THAT ITS REQUEST FOR RENEWAL OF AUTHORIZATION FOR IMPORT OF GOLD FOR FY 2018-19 CANNOT BE ACCEDED
* SAYS THE DISCLOSURE DOES NOT HAVE MATERIAL IMPACT ON THE BANK Source text - bit.ly/2uNYZ6Z Further company coverage:
